text: A Man of Integrity () is a 2017 Iranian drama film directed by Mohammad Rasoulof. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival where it won the main prize. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Iranian films Category:Iranian drama films Category:Persian-language films
title: A Man of Integrity
